fields.description:
After executing the steps to run euca-bundle-vol and import the new image into the system. The instance will fail to launch with the following console log:

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-get-console-output i-5796a2c5 --region account2-user11@
i-5796a2c5

^[[1;256r^[[256;256H^[[6n
Google, Inc.
Serial Graphics Adapter 12/07/11
SGABIOS $Id: sgabios.S 8 2010-04-22 00:03:40Z nlaredo $ (mockbuild@c6b18n1.dev.centos.org) Wed Dec  7 17:04:47 UTC 2011
Term: 80x24
4 0
SeaBIOS (version seabios-0.6.1.2-28.el6)
Machine UUID 7ee9aae4-ca7a-b1d2-b506-d08b71188b9e


gPXE (http://etherboot.org) - 00:03.0 C100 PCI2.10 PnP BBS PMM3FE0@10 C100


Booting from Hard Disk...
{code}

Test out on Ubuntu and CentOS 6.5 and ran into the same issue (after working around another issue with CentOS).

After instrumenting the euca-bundle-vol module (bundlevolume.py) to pause the image creation process, we can see that the image does not have a bootloader installed on it:
 
{code}
[root@ip-172-16-132-57 bundled-vol]# file image
image: x86 boot sector; partition 1: ID=0x83, active, starthead 2, startsector 64, 20971456 sectors, code offset 0xb8
{code}

Looking at other images, and when I attempted to put Grub onto the image it looks like this:
{code}
[root@ip-172-16-132-57 bundled-vol]# file image
image: x86 boot sector; GRand Unified Bootloader, stage1 version 0x3, stage2 address 0x2000, stage2 segment 0x200, GRUB version 0.94; partition 1: ID=0x83, active, starthead 2, startsector 64, 20971456 sectors, code offset 0x48
{code}

This led to the instance being able to boot, although other issues were encountered..but I believe that is because I was invoking Grub incorrectly.

*Detailed Reproduction Steps*
_Testing done on Ubuntu instance_

Note: Steps are pretty much the same for CentOS, except you need to install 'parted' and modify the euca2ools bundlevolume.py module to remove '-d' option being passed to the 'blkid' command

# Followed the instructions to [install euca2ools 3.1 from source|https://github.com/eucalyptus/euca2ools/blob/master/INSTALL] (since we don't have any DEB packages)
# Installed kpartx
# Copied credentials, cloud-cert.pem, and euca2ools config file to instance
# Ran euca-bundle-vol in the instance
{code}
ubuntu@euca-172-17-115-142:~$ sudo /usr/local/bin/euca-bundle-vol --cert /home/ubuntu/account2-user11/account2-user11-cert.pem --privatekey /home/ubuntu/account2-user11/account2-user11-pk.pem --ec2cert /home/ubuntu/cloud-cert.pem --exclude /bundled-vol --user 325271821652 --destination /bundled-vol -r x86_64 --no-inherit --partition mbr
{code}
# Uploaded the bundle from the instance
{code}
ubuntu@euca-172-17-115-142:~$ euca-upload-bundle -b ubuntu-bundled-vol -m /bundled-vol/image.manifest.xml --region account2-user11@
Uploaded ubuntu-bundled-vol/image.manifest.xml
{code}
# Registered the image from the instance
{code}
ubuntu@euca-172-17-115-142:~$ euca-register ubuntu-bundled-vol/image.manifest.xml -n ubuntu-bundled-vol -a x86_64 --virtualization-type hvm --region account2-user11@
IMAGE   emi-65713fc6
{code}
#* INFO log in cloud-output.log
{code}
Mon Sep 29 18:59:56 2014  INFO [Images:EucalyptusRequestQueue.02] Registering image pk=emi-65713fc6 ownerId=arn:aws:euare::325271821652:user/user11
Mon Sep 29 18:59:56 2014  INFO [Images:EucalyptusRequestQueue.02] Triggering cache population in Walrus for: emi-65713fc6
{code}
# Checked to see if image was registered correctly
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-images  emi-65713fc6 --region account2-user11@
IMAGE   emi-65713fc6    ubuntu-bundled-vol/image.manifest.xml   325271821652    available       private x86_64  machine                         instance-store  hvm
{code}
# Launched instance from EMI
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-run-instances -k account2-user11 -t m1.large emi-65713fc6 --region account2-user11@
RESERVATION     r-431cf4fc      325271821652    default
INSTANCE        i-5796a2c5      emi-65713fc6                    pending account2-user11 0               m1.large        2014-09-30T02:01:48.625Z        Honest       monitoring-disabled      0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0                 instance-store                                  hvm                     sg-6ef9907f
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-5796a2c5 --region account2-user11@
RESERVATION     r-431cf4fc      325271821652    default
INSTANCE        i-5796a2c5      emi-65713fc6    euca-10-104-7-13.future.future.euca-hasp.cs.prc.eucalyptus-systems.com  euca-172-17-115-153.future.internal     running       account2-user11 0               m1.large        2014-09-30T02:01:48.625Z        Honest                          monitoring-disabled     10.104.7.13     172.17.115.153                        instance-store                                  hvm                     sg-6ef9907f
{code}
# Checked console output to see if image launched correctly:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-get-console-output i-5796a2c5 --region account2-user11@
i-5796a2c5
